sentence.Network_en: I am Thine, O Lord, I have heard Thy voice.
sentence.Network_cn: 主啊，我属于您，我已经听见您的声音。

sentence.Network_en: If not for his sake, then doubly for thine own!
sentence.Network_cn: 即使不是为了他的缘故, 那么总是加倍地为了你自己嘛!

sentence.Network_en: Exchange this false life of thine for a true one.
sentence.Network_cn: 把你的虚伪的生活变成真实的生活吧.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Shelly to Elizabeth Hitchener ... conjecture 推测，臆测 thine <古> 你的东西，你的 endeavor 努力，尽力.
英语双语故事狐狸和乌鸦_英语网 ... thy 你的(古语) thine 你的(古语) a match for …… 的对手.

thou hast scattered thine enemies with strong arm ., 你用有能的膀臂打散了你的仇敌.
up thine eyes to the LIGHT of the Cosmos ., 提升你的眼睛向着宇宙之光.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English thīn, of Germanic origin; related to German dein, also to thou

entry.tran: 你的(yours 在古时、诗歌或宗教中的用语)
entry.def: Thine is an old-fashioned, poetic, or religious word for 'yours' when you are talking to only one person.

example.ex: I am Thine, O Lord, I have heard Thy voice.
example.tran: 主啊，我属于您，我已经听见您的声音。

list.explanation: (表示反感和十分强烈反抗或拒绝的感叹语)

example.en: Up thine with turpentine, will you?
Take that token raise and up thine with turpentine.
example.zh: 这种假惺惺的加薪，你们收回去算了。

auth_sentence.content: I see how thine eye would emulate the diamond.

auth_sentence.content: To stand or fall Free in thine own Arbitrament it lies.
